value.title: #D49 - Add rows and columns to tables using M in power query
value.excerpt: In this video, I am going to show you how to add column and rows to a table in power query without appending it. value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.
